channel.title: Elantris on Shirley Zhou
channel.description: Recent content in Elantris on Shirley Zhou

item.title: Elantris
item.description: Elantris was pretty freaking legit. Thoughts dump It’s clear that this is an early book, and Sanderson recycles themes.1 The main characters here have clear echos with Mistborn – it’s as if Mistborn is an expanded version of Elantris. Arguably not as successful because it’s not as concise. Sanderson books feature strong female characters. 2 Thoughts dump 2 I never quite understood why recycling themes is such a sin among writers, e.
